  • public class Repair
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Repair

        public Repair(int bikeID,
              java.lang.String desc,
              java.time.LocalDate date)
        This constructor is used when a repair request is generated. This alone will not register in the database, but fills the required fields for registration. This followed by its method startRepairRequest
        Parameters:
        bikeID - The ID of the bike which the repair belongs to
        desc - The description of the repairs needed
        date - The registration date of the request

      • Repair

        public Repair(int bikeID,
              int caseID,
              java.lang.String desc,
              java.lang.String returnDesc,
              java.time.LocalDate requestDate,
              java.time.LocalDate returnDate,
              double price)
        When the registration has been added to the database the DBH uses this method to return and attach the repair to a bike.
        Parameters:
        bikeID - The ID of the bike which the Repair belongs to
        caseID - The caseID given by the database to keep track of the specific request
        desc - The description of the repairs needed
        returnDesc - The description of the repairs that have been preformed on the bike
        requestDate - The date the request was created
        returnDate - The date when the request is complete
        price - The total price of the repair job

    • Method Detail

      • startRepairRequest

        public boolean startRepairRequest()
        startRepairRequest is the method that has to be run in order to register the required fields in the database
        Returns:
        a boolean based on the results from the database. True = Registered, False = Not registered

      • finishRepairRequest

        public boolean finishRepairRequest(java.lang.String returnDesc,
                                   java.time.LocalDate returnDate,
                                   double price)
        finishRepairRequest takes inn all the parameters needed to fulfill the Repair request. By using this method the Repair object also gets registered in teh database as completed with the data passed through.
        Parameters:
        returnDesc - The description of the repairs that have been preformed on the bike
        returnDate - The date when the request is complete
        price - The total price of the repair job
        Returns:
        a boolean based on the results from the database. True = Registered as complete, False = No changes in the database or to the object.
